entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:01 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
